title: Cant find the app...

embed.description: Read reviews, compare customer ratings, see screenshots, and learn more about League Friends. Download League Friends and enjoy it on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.

body:
iTunes says the app exists, so does riots announcement today. Am I the only one where the app literally _doesn't show up_ when searching the app store on my iPhone???

I cannot find it **at all** 

Not sure why, but the thing doesn't even exist. " _riot games_ " isn't even a listed company according to The App Store

replies.body: Just got it, thank you! For some reason the app literally just didn't exist yesterday, and I searched everything from "_League_" to "_League Friends & league friends & league of legends_" etc. Thanks again!!
lol Thanks Sparkle :D I was having the same problem as Penguin XD It didnt even say that Riot was a company? Might have to fix that for future searches. But thanks :D {{champion:74}}
VERY good, Thank you .  Everybody should try his way :)))))
That was still extremely difficult to find.
This will change a bit once it gets app reviews in the app store, it will begin to come up as a higher recommended app based on the "league of legends" appstore search

its not available in my country x-x 
{{champion:32}}
Yup, I just tried too. I live in the emirates and it's not on the store. :/
